title: 190 47 "Angel Island, Obliterated! The Horror of The Raigo's Advent!!"Transliteration: "Enjerushima shōmetsu! Raigō kōrin no kyōfu!" (Japanese:エンジェル島消滅!雷迎降臨の恐怖!!) Ken Koyama Hirohiko Kamisaka April 25, 2004(2004-04-25) January 2, 2009
